columns.name: mount_target_id
columns.description: The ID of the mount target.

columns.name: file_system_id
columns.description: The ID of the file system for which the mount target is intended.

columns.name: life_cycle_state
columns.description: Lifecycle state of the mount target.

columns.name: availability_zone_id
columns.description: The unique and consistent identifier of the Availability Zone that the mount target resides in.

columns.name: availability_zone_name
columns.description: The name of the Availability Zone in which the mount target is located.

columns.name: ip_address
columns.description: Address at which the file system can be mounted by using the mount target.

columns.name: network_interface_id
columns.description: The ID of the network interface that Amazon EFS created when it created the mount target.

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: AWS account ID that owns the resource.

columns.name: subnet_id
columns.description: The ID of the mount target's subnet.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) ID that the mount target is configured in.

columns.name: security_groups
columns.description: Specifies the security groups currently in effect for a mount target.
